ProductInfo.Features:
2.3 GHz Intel Core i7 quad-core processor (3.3 GHz with Turbo Boost Technology; 6 MB L3 cache), Mac OS X v10.8 Mountain Lion
8 GB DDR3 RAM; 750 GB Hard Drive (7200 RPM), 8x slot-loading SuperDrive with double-layer DVD support (DVD±R DL/DVD±RW/CD-RW)
15.4-inch LED-backlit glossy widescreen display with edge-to-edge, uninterrupted glass (1440x900-pixel resolution)
Dual graphics processors with automatic switching between NVIDIA GeForce GT 650M (with 512 MB of GDDR5 video memory) for demanding applications and integrated Intel HD Graphics 4000 for power savings
Gigabit Ethernet wired networking (10/100/1000), Bluetooth 4.0 for connecting with peripherals such as keyboards, mice and cell phones
ProductInfo.Name: Apple MacBook Pro 15.4-Inch Laptop Intel Quad-Core i7 2.3GHz, 750 GB Hard Drive, 8GB DDR3 Memory, DVD Burner (NEWEST VERSION)
